text:
Hello <@U04KG19KN0K>

Yes it is possible. But you have to create a folder name is modules inside the child theme and create custom modules inside it. It will work.

See screenshot

Awesome, that works. You all rock. My only issue now is that the theme is referencing the CTA feature (module) which is not enabled on our account. This means I cannot override and publish a child template because it throws an error. Any thoughts? 1) Enable the CTA feature. 2) Override all templates that reference it in the child theme and get rid of that code?
